input.sentences: today we went to [male] 's seafood restaurant to celebrate [male] and [female] 's engagement .
they were happy to be here and to celebrate their happy moment with their family and friends .
all the boys wanted a photo together . they have grown up to be such gentlemen !
here is the happy couple . [female] and [male] have been dating for 2 years .
[male] shows off one of the presents that he and [female] received . it will look nice in their living room .
output.sentences: Archibald has opened a new restaurant. He will be head chef.
He invited all his friends to his soft open, and then came.
All his buddies from his old restaurant are very proud of him.
But the proudest person is his wife.
To commemorate the occasion, they gave Archibald a cake.
